content: धातुः [धा-आधारे तुन्] {@--1@} A constituent or essential part, an ingredient. {@--2@} An element, primary or elementary substance, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} पृथिवी, अप्, तेजस्, वायु and आकाश. {@--3@} A secretion, primary fluid or juice, essential ingredient of the body (which are considered to be 7: --रसासृङ्मांसमेदोऽस्थिमज्जाशुक्राणि धातवः, or sometimes ten if केश, त्वच् and स्नायु be added). {@--4@} A humour or affection of the body, ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} वात, पित्त and कफ). {@--5@} A mineral, metal, metallic ore; न्यस्ताक्षरा धातुरसेन यत्र <ls>Ku. 1. 7</ls>; त्वामालिख्य प्रणयकुपितां धातुरागैः शिलायां <ls>Me. 105</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 71</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 51.</ls> {@--6@} A verbal root; भूवादयो धातवः <ls>P. I. 3. 1</ls>; पश्चादध्ययनार्थस्य धातोरधिरिवाभवत् <ls>R. 15. 9.</ls> {@--7@} The soul. {@--8@} The Supreme Spirit. {@--9@} An organ of sense. {@--10@} Any one of the properties of the five elements, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} रूप, रस, गंध, स्पर्श; and शब्द. {@--11@} A bone. {@--12@} A part, portion. {@--13@} A fluid mineral of a red colour. {@--14@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A supporter. {@--15@} Anything to be drunk, as milk &c. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} A milch cow.
